name: Bernie Sanders
title: U.S. Senator from Vermont
summary: Bernie Sanders is known for his passionate, Brooklyn-accented delivery, emphatic hand gestures, and direct, no-nonsense speaking style when addressing economic and social issues.
bio: Bernard Sanders is an American politician and activist who has served as the junior United States senator from Vermont since 2007. He was the U.S. representative for the state's at-large congressional district from 1991 to 2007. He is the longest-serving independent in U.S. congressional history.

samples.title: Economic Inequality
samples.description: Speech on wealth inequality in America
samples.fullText: The issue of wealth and income inequality is the great moral issue of our time, it is the great economic issue of our time, and it is the great political issue of our time.
tips: Pay special attention to his Brooklyn accent on words like 'moral' and 'political'
Notice how he emphasizes words by stretching them out
Focus on his passionate, rising delivery when making key points
